get.description: Returns the list of approvers assigned to the specified bidding report in display order. If isExceptionReport=true, approvers for the exception report approval flow are returned.

parameters.name: isExceptionReport
parameters.description: Set to true to retrieve approvers for the exception report approval flow.

post.description: Assigns a list of approvers to the specified bidding report, replacing any existing approvers.
Transitions the bidding report to PendingApproval and sends notifications to approvers.
Registers the current approver's approval. If all required approvers have approved, the report transitions to Ð¡ompleted status.
Registers the current approver's rejection. The bidding report transitions to Active status and the approval flow is stopped.
Transitions the bidding report to Active status, records the coordinator's rollback comment, and stops the current approval process.

get.summary: Get approval history for bidding report
get.description: Returns approval history events for the specified bidding report. If isExceptionReport=true, returns history for the exception report approval flow.

parameters.name: isExceptionReport
parameters.description: True to retrieve history for the exception report approval flow.

get.summary: Get Information from the SmartGEP / AribaProposals / BiddingProposals by the Period yyyy-mm
Get MinEntryPrice for Propane and Butane by the Period yyyy-mm

put.summary: Edit MinEntryPrice for Propane and Butane by the Period yyyy-mm-dd

post.description: Returns a paged collection of audit log entries filtered and sorted per the supplied criteria.

requestBody.description: Filtering, sorting and paging parameters for querying audit log entries.

put.description: Edit active bidding report. Also changes status that depends on final award volume value.

put.summary: Edit status of active bidding report

put.description: Edit exception report. Also changes status that depends on final award volume value.
Updates AdditionalVolumePR, AdditionalVolumeBT, Comments for multiple BiddingHistoryAnalysis entries belonging to a single bidding report.

put.summary: Edit status of history analysis row
put.description: Edits status of a single history analysis row and updates its templated comment.

post.description: Creates bidding report with new status

put.description: Gets shipments and creates history analysis. Changes report status to "History Analyzed".
Calculates RLF by bidding proposals changes report status to "Active" status
Calculates summary for bidding report, calls two stored procedures
This route mostly used to return bidding report to base state before any changes
Addional information is only caption that can be updated.

get.description: Creates pdf file with bidding report & data & summary & approvers

post.description: Performs a paged search over customer bidding data using optional filters and sorting.
Generates a customer bidding report using optional filters and sorting and returns it as a file.

get.description: Returns a lightweight list of customer names for autocomplete based on optional filters.
Returns existing mappings and distinct bidder names from BiddingData (CustomerName column).

put.description: Sets AribaCustomerName to a value that must exist in BiddingData.CustomerName (Bidder).

get.description: Returns a list of approvers belonging to the committee member group.
Returns a list of approvers belonging to the delegates group.
Fetches all current bidding configuration values from CustomValues table.

put.description: Updates specified bidding settings; unspecified properties remain unchanged.
